name: Escape: Maggoth - A Roguelike
description:
If one day you awake in the ever-changing Maggoth dungeon, the only thing I can recommend is to get out as soon as possible. Find the exit of each level avoiding the Maggoth's lethal touch... and keep an eye out for treasure chests while you're at it.

Made as a 15 days challenge to finish a 3D game. Inspired by: https://nartier.itch.io/thine-cometh

----
You can replace the images (room_1 to room_4, room_start and room_exit) inside Roguelike/Content/RoomSources to modify the layout of the randomly generated dungeons. Images must be 16x16 and use the same color codes as the existing ones (you can use a color picker):

- black: walls (room sides that lead nowhere will be sealed anyway) 
- red: enemies
- blue: exit
- brown: chest
- green: potions
